metadata.title: CVE-2023-6816 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in X.Org server. Both DeviceFocusEvent and theXIQueryPointer reply contain a bit for each logical button currently down.Buttons can be arbitrarily mapped to any value up to 255, but the X.OrgServer was only allocating space for the device's particular number ofbuttons, leading to a heap overflow if a bigger value was used.

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
